description: I keep us safe from evil words!
name: Safety Steve
creator: GEONE
guild_admins: Users who can manage configs for this guild (mention)
invoker: Used as the prefix for commands (str)
vote_limit: How many times per day each user may vote using the good/bad bot command (int)
gild_limit: How many times per day each user may award a gild using the gild command (int)
point_value_in_currency: How much currency each point can be exchanged for using the exchange commmand (int)
gilding_value_in_currency: How much currency each gilding can be exchanged for using the exchange commmand (int)
weekly_score_decay: How many points each user's score will decay by every week (int)
bad_word_response: Hey! No bad words, please. This is a Christian server!
The respose to a bad word being said (str)
bad_words: The list of bad words the bot will respond to (list)
bad_words_exceptions: A list of words/prefixes that contain one of the bad words that the bot will ignore (list)
